'true' as QUERYID,
from CMS_ADVERTISEMENT
order by ${orderByClause}

update CMS_ADVERTISEMENT set STATUS = 0, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate, UPDATED_BY = 'SYSTEM' where END_TIME < sysdate and STATUS = 1
